member.summary: Set the filename of the IP intelligence data file that the engine should use.
member.param: The data file
member.exception: Thrown if the filename has an unknown extension.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetFilename(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the filename of the IP intelligence data file that the engine should use.
member.param: The data file
The license key to use when checking for updates to the data file. This parameter can be set to null, but doing so will disable automatic updates.
True to create a temporary copy of the data file when the engine is built. This is required in order for automatic updates to work correctly.
member.exception: Thrown if the filename has an unknown extension.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetShareUsage(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set share usage enabled/disabled. Defaults to enabled.
member.param: true to enable usage sharing. False to disable.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Add the specified property as one to be returned. By default, all properties will be returned. Reducing the properties that are returned can yield a performance improvement in some scenarios.
member.param: The property to be populated by.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetAutoUpdate(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable/Disable auto update. Defaults to enabled. If enabled, the auto update system will automatically download and apply new data files for IP Intelligence.
member.param: true to enable auto update. False to disable.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetDataUpdateOnStartUp(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable/Disable update on startup. Defaults to enabled. If enabled, the auto update system will be used to check for an update before the IP intelligence engine is created. If an update is available, it will be downloaded and applied before the pipeline is built and returned for use so this may take some time.
member.param: True to enable update on startup. False to disable.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetDataUpdateLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary: Set the license key used when checking for new IP intelligence data files. Defaults to null.
member.param: The license key

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetUpdatePollingInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the time between checks for a new data file made by the FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Services.DataUpdateService. Default = 30 minutes.
member.param: The number of seconds between checks.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetUpdatePollingInterval(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Set the time between checks for a new data file made by the FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Services.DataUpdateService. Default = 30 minutes.
member.param: The time between checks.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetUpdateRandomisationMax(System.Int32)
member.summary: A random element can be added to the FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Services.DataUpdateService polling interval. This option sets the maximum length of this random addition. Default = 10 minutes.
member.param: The maximum time added to the data update polling interval.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetUpdateRandomisationMax(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: A random element can be added to the FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Services.DataUpdateService polling interval. This option sets the maximum length of this random addition. Default = 10 minutes.
member.param: The maximum time added to the data update polling interval.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetDataUpdateVerifyMd5(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set a value indicating if the should expect the response from the data update URL to contain a 'content-md5' HTTP header that can be used to verify the integrity of the content.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiOnPremisePipelineBuilder.SetDataFileSystemWatcher(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The has the ability to watch a file on disk and refresh the engine as soon as that file is updated. This setting enables/disables that feature.
member.param: Pass true to enable the feature.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiPipelineBuilder.UseCloud(System.String)
member.summary: Use the 51Degrees Cloud service to perform IP intelligence.
member.param: The resource key to use when querying the Cloud service. Obtain one from https://configure.51degrees.com
member.returns: A builder that can be used to configure and build a pipeline that will use the Cloud IP intelligence engine.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiPipelineBuilder.UseCloud(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use the 51Degrees Cloud service to perform IP intelligence.
member.param: The resource key to use when querying the Cloud service. Obtain one from https://configure.51degrees.com
The 51Degrees Cloud URL.
member.returns: A builder that can be used to configure and build a pipeline that will use the Cloud IP intelligence engine.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiPipelineBuilder.UseOnPremise(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use a 51Degrees on-premise IP intelligence engine to perform IP intelligence.
member.param: The full path to the IP intelligence data file.
If true, the engine will create a temporary copy of the data file rather than using the data file directly.
member.returns: A builder that can be used to configure and build a pipeline that will use the on-premise IP intelligence engine.
member.exception: Thrown if a required parameter is null

member.name: M:FiftyOne.IpIntelligence.IpiPipelineBuilder.UseOnPremise(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use a 51Degrees on-premise IP intelligence engine to perform IP intelligence.
member.param: The full path to the IP intelligence data file.

The license key to use when checking for updates to the data file. A license key can be obtained from the [51Degrees website](https://www.51degrees.com/pricing). If you have no license key then this parameter can be set to null, but doing so will disable automatic updates.
If true, the engine will create a temporary copy of the data file rather than using the data file directly. This is required in order for automatic updates to work correctly.
member.returns: A builder that can be used to configure and build a pipeline that will use the on-premise IP intelligence engine.
member.exception: Thrown if a required parameter is null
